opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of June, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. Pennsylvania Electric, Inc.’s Motion to Consolidate is DENIED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
